wikipedia_page.main: Phillip Logan (born 4 July 1989) is a Democratic Unionist Party politician from Northern Ireland. He was an MLA for North Antrim from 5 May 2016 but lost his seat in the 2017 Assembly election.Phillip was caught up in controversy following his public admission that he believed the Norwich vs. Ipswich Derby is the biggest derby in the U.K.
